ChangeList.Description: Added support for the custom query option `changeType` on the [delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-v1.0).

Added support for the custom query option `changeType` on the [delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) method of [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta).

When [creating a subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources, setting the **includeResourceData** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to `true` enables change notifications to include resource data.

When [creating a subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources, setting the **encryptionCertificate** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to a certificate with a public key enables encrypting and including resource data as part of a change notification.

When [creating a subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources, setting the **encryptionCertificateId** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta) resource allows an app to identify the appropriate certificate to decrypt any resource data in a change notification.

For subscriptions to changes in Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources that include resource data, the **encryptedContent** property of changeNotification contains the encrypted data of the changed resource and related information to decrypt it.

For subscriptions to changes in Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-beta), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resources that include resource data, the **resourceData** property of changeNotification identifies the changed resource.
Added the **userPurpose** property to the [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the [userPurpose](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/userpurpose?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the **userPurpose** enumeration type.
Renamed the **mailboxRecipientType** enumeration as **userPurpose**.
Removed the `unknown` member from the **userPurpose** enumeration.
Added the **contentId** property to [attachmentItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **contentId** property to [attachmentItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added support for the delegated permission (personal Microsoft account) of `Contacts.Read` to the read operations of the [profilePhoto](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/profilephoto?view=graph-rest-v1.0) resource.

Added support for the delegated permission (personal Microsoft account) of `Contacts.ReadWrite` to the read operations of the [profilePhoto](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/profilephoto?view=graph-rest-v1.0) resource.
Adding the capability to [send a message in MIME format](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/outlook-send-mime-message).
Added the **isHidden** property to [mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?view=graph-rest-v1.0) entity.
Added the support of the optional `includeHiddenFolders` query parameter to the [list mailFolders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-v1.0) operation.
Added the **hideAttendees** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **hideAttendees** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **isDefaultCalendar** property to the calendar entity.
Added the **hexColor** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar) entity.
Added the **isDraft** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event) entity.
Added the [cancel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-cancel) method to manage [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event) resources in a calendar.
Added the [forward](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-forward) method to manage [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event) resources in a calendar.
Added the **isHidden** property to [mailFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailfolder?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the support of the optional `includeHiddenFolders` query parameter to the [list mailFolders](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-mailfolders?view=graph-rest-beta) operation.
Added the **transactionId** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **cancelledOccurrences**, **exceptionOccurrences**, and **occurrenceId** properties to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the **allowNewTimeProposals** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [eventMessageRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessagerequest?view=graph-rest-1.0) entities.

Added the **proposedNewTime** optional parameter to the [tentativelyAccept](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-tentativelyaccept?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [decline](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-decline?view=graph-rest-1.0) methods of **event**.

Added the [eventMessageResponse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessageresponse?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity that is based on [eventMessage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/eventmessage?view=graph-rest-1.0), and in addition, includes the **proposedNewTime** and **responseType** properties.
Added the **proposedNewTime** property to the [attendee](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attendee?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

The [delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) function supports an additional scenario to get incremental changes (new, updated, or removed) of events in a user calendar without necessarily being bounded by a date range.

Places API available in v1. Added the [place](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place?view=graph-rest-1.0), [room](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/room?view=graph-rest-1.0), [roomList](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/room?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources and their methods to provide rich details for locations in apps.
Added pagination support for the [places API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/place?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new entity [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-update?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) APIs to manage [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources on [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new complex type [onlineMeetingInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeetinginfo?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the **isOnlineMeeting**, **onlineMeetingProvider** and **onlineMeeting** properties to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity. **isOnlineMeeting** and **onlineMeetingProvider** are optional parameters to the [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-post-events?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-update?view=graph-rest-1.0) methods of **event**.

Added the **defaultOnlineMeetingProviders** and **allowedOnlineMeetingProviders** properties to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **isTallyingResponses** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **isRemovable** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **delegateMeetingMessageDeliveryOptions** property to the [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxSettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Support for [file attachments up to 150MB](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/outlook-large-attachments) for an [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) instance.

[Adding file attachments up to 150MB](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/outlook-large-attachments) to a [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0) instance.

The [attachmentItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachmentitem?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type, [createUploadSession](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/attachment-createuploadsession?view=graph-rest-1.0) action for the [attachment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/attachment?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity, and the **attachmentType** enumeration.
Added the **calendarGroupId** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **isDraft** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [calendar: getSchedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-getschedule?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-list-calendarview?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List events](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-list-events?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendargroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendargroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendars](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendargroup-list-calendars?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendargroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-get?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarPermissions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-list-calendarpermissions?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [event: delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-delta?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-get?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List instances](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-list-instances?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarGroups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendargroups?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendars](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendars?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendarview?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List events](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [user: reminderView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-reminderview?view=graph-rest-beta) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [markAsJunk](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-markasjunk?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [markAsNotJunk](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-markasnotjunk?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [calendar: getSchedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-getschedule?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-list-calendarview?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List events](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-list-events?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendargroup-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendargroup?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendars](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendargroup-list-calendars?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [calendarGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendargroup?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarPermissions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendar-list-calendarpermissions?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [event: delta](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [Get event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List instances](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-list-instances?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarGroups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendargroups?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendars](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendars?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List calendarView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-calendarview?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [List events](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-events?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the application and delegated permission `Calendars.ReadBasic` to the [user: reminderView](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-reminderview?view=graph-rest-1.0) method of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Updated the Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event), and [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message) resources to enable change notifications to include resource data when the **includeResourceData** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription) resource is set to `true`.

Updated the Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event), and [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message) resources to enable change notifications to include resource data when the **encryptionCertificate** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription) resource is set with a certificate with a public key that enables encrypting and including resource data as part of a change notification.

Updated the Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event), and [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message) resources to enable change notifications to include resource data when the **encryptionCertificateId** property of the [subscription](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/subscription) is set to allow an app to identify the appropriate certificate to decrypt any resource data in a change notification.

For subscriptions to changes in Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message) resources that include resource data, the **encryptedContent** property of changeNotification contains the encrypted data of the changed resource and related information to decrypt it.

For subscriptions to changes in Outlook [contact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contact), [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event), or [message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/message) resources that include resource data, the **resourceData** property of changeNotification identifies the changed resource.
Added the **iCalUId** property to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
